channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Stockage d’énergie et STEP : pourquoi EDF mise encore des milliards sur cette technologie « à l’ancienne »
item.description: Les centrales hydroélectriques ne servent pas uniquement à produire de l’électricité. Certaines peuvent aussi faire office de batteries géantes, indispensables à l’équilibre du réseau électrique.

item.title: Pentagon may sever Anthropic relationship over AI safeguards - Claude maker expresses concerns over 'hard limits around fully autonomous weapons and mass domestic surveillance'
item.description: The Pentagon is threating to cut a $200 million contract with Anthropic over a rift in how the Claude AI model should be used.

item.title: 4 great soundbars in the Presidents' Day sales that will instantly boost your TVs audio game — but will keep your wallet healthy

item.title: This Anker battery pack solved my battery anxiety — and it’s on sale this Presidents' Day
item.description: This Anker portable charger, which is small enough for everyday carry, has become my go-to travel accessory for keeping phones and other devices powered on the move.

item.title: The Apple Podcasts app is switching to HTTP Live Streaming video technology
item.description: Apple is planning a major update for its Podcasts app. The entire app is switching to the company's HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) video technology. Previously, it streamed video in various formats like MOV, MP4 and M4V. This provides several benefits for the end user. It lets people switch seamlessly between watching and listening, in addition to offering a horizontal full display option. It'll also make both video and audio streams available to download for offline viewing. This wasn't possible with the previous streaming method, which pulled content from an RSS-like feed. The technology integrat...

item.title: iPhone Fold rumors: Everything we know so far, including the leaked design, upgrades, price and more details
item.description: Apple still hasn’t officially announced a foldable iPhone, but the rumor mill hasn’t slowed down. Over the past few months, analysts, supply-chain watchers and leakers have continued to sketch out what Apple’s first folding phone might look like and when it could finally arrive. Most signs still point to a late-2026 debut, though plenty could change between now and then.As always with unreleased Apple hardware, nothing here is confirmed. Plans can shift, features can be reworked and timelines can slip. Still, the volume and consistency of recent reporting gives us a better sense than ever of h...

item.title: Amazon réduit de 20 % le prix de ce mini vidéoprojecteur Full HD, parfait pour les petits budgets
item.description: Envie d'un vidéoprojecteur pour mater vos films et séries et vivre une expérience comme au cinéma sans payer le prix fort ? Le Philips Neopix 444 est un bon candidat : il est d'ailleurs en promotion à 299 euros contre 369 euros habituellement.

item.title: New tax rules are in effect this season—and many filers don’t know about them
item.description: New deductions and rule changes could mean a larger refund for millions of taxpayers this year. Tax filing season is in full swing, and while preparing your taxes can often be filled with stress, misplaced documents, and worries about proper filing, this year, there may be a silver lining. According to analysts, many Americans may get larger refunds in 2026 due to Trump’s 2025 One Big Beautiful Bill legislation....

item.title: Most ransomware playbooks don't address machine credentials. Attackers know it.
item.description: The gap between ransomware threats and the defenses meant to stop them is getting worse, not better. Ivanti’s 2026 State of Cybersecurity Report found that the preparedness gap widened by an average of 10 points year over year across every threat category the firm tracks. Ransomware hit the widest spread: 63% of security professionals rate it a high or critical threat, but just 30% say they are “very prepared” to defend against it. That’s a 33-point gap, up from 29 points a year ago.CyberArk’s 2025 Identity Security Landscape puts numbers to the problem: 82 machine identities for every human i...

item.title: I've been running Dungeons & Dragons for 12 years: here are 12 gadgets and essentials I use all the time as a DM — and 2 that I wish I had
item.description: I'm an expert DM, and these are the 12 actually useful items I can't live without — and 2 more I really want.

item.title: « Vous pouvez jailbreaker un F-35 comme un iPhone » : pourquoi les Pays-Bas envisagent de cracker leurs avions de chasse
item.description: Le fleuron de l’aviation américaine pourrait-il être « jailbreaké » aussi facilement qu’un iPhone ? C’est en tout cas la piste évoquée par l'ancien secrétaire d’État à la Défense des Pays-Bas dans le cas où les États-Unis décideraient de bloquer à distance l’utilisation de sa flotte de F-35 et de celles d’autres alliés européens.

item.title: Looking for a great deal on a KitchenAid mixer this Presidents' Day? Skip the sales and get an officially refurbished one half price instead
item.description: Find huge savings on KitchenAid's officially refurbished mixers, which come complete with warranties and full customer service.

item.title: I can't recommend this Dell laptop deal enough - this Windows 11 machine is the ultimate 'work-from-anywhere' machine in the Presidents' Day sale
item.description: The $330 Dell 15 Laptop ticks all my boxes for business or home use, with a Core 3 processor, 8GB RAM, and a fast 512GB SSD.

item.title: Edifier’s portable wireless speaker has won me over with its bargain price, compelling sound and stunning looks — and this $100 President’s Day discount makes it a must-buy

item.title: Farewell Apple iWork? Iconic brand appears to be disappearing in favor of Creator Studio
item.description: Apple's iWork brand looks to have been retired after two decades, with the launch of new Creator Studio, which includes paid subscriptions.

item.title: My favorite Windows 11 mini PC is perfect for work and it's got a big price-cut in the Presidents' Day sale — but you'll need to act fast
item.description: The Geekom A5 Pro mini PC delivers fast everyday performance in a tiny, space saving design, and it's now down to $699 for Presidents' Day.

item.description: If you're shopping for a budget-friendly and high-quality gaming laptop in the Presidents' Day sales, then it's going to be hard to beat this Alienware 16X Aurora for $999.99.

item.description: It seems like every pair of earbuds I've enjoyed is discounted right now; here are five you should check out, all at reduced prices.

item.title: I've spent 18 hours taking down Big Pharma in High On Life 2, and it's exactly what a sequel should be
item.description: High On Life 2 is an inventive FPS campaign that improves on its predecessor in every way, but a litany of technical faults has it feeling like it could've stayed in the oven for a bit longer.

item.title: Triple Matinale au menu : voici notre programme Twitch de la semaine
item.description: Notre programme Twitch de la semaine du lundi 16 févier 2026, c’est juste ici : nous vous donnons rendez-vous, mardi, jeudi et vendredi sur notre chaîne Frandroidlive, pour siroter votre café devant notre Matinale Tech' nouvelle formule.

item.title: Tout simplement monstrueux : ce laptop gaming avec une RTX 5080, un Intel Core U9 et un écran 2,5K 18″ est en promo à -900 €
item.description: C'est tout simplement le laptop gaming ultime : l'Asus ROG Strix G18 est une machine de guerre suréquipée que vous retrouvez chez E.Leclerc pour 3 099 euros au lieu de 3 999 euros.

item.title: Il divise le temps de travail par 280 : ce robot géant de Stellantis fait en 1 heure ce qu’un employé fait en 7 semaines
item.description: Dans son usine américaine de Sterling Heights, dans le Michigan, Stellantis a déployé un robot autonome de 3,66 mètres de haut capable de scanner l'intégralité de son inventaire de pièces en une heure. Une innovation qui divise le temps de travail par 280 selon le constructeur.

item.title: Les stocks de disques durs mécaniques passent eux aussi à la casserole
item.description: La mémoire vive et le stockage SSD ne sont pas les seuls composants touchés par la demande gigantesque des entreprises de l'IA. L'approvisionnement en bons vieux disques durs traditionnels est lui aussi sous tension ! Western Digital affirme ainsi avoir écoulé l'ensemble de sa capacité de production pour 2026 — et nous ne sommes qu'en février.

item.title: How Ricursive Intelligence raised $335M at a $4B valuation in 4 months
item.description: The reason why this nascent startup had VCs lining up is the founders.They are so famed in the AI world, everyone tried to hire them.

item.title: 'The world is in peril' — 5 reasons why the AI apocalypse might be closer than you think

item.description: An erotic crime thriller, 56 Days will premiere on Prime Video in the next few days — here's when you can watch it.

item.title: Arnaques par SMS et appels malveillantes : cette application filtre tout gratuitement
item.description: L'application Saracroche passe à la version 4.0. Au programme : une refonte complète et la possibilité de filtrer les SMS malveillants. Une application must-have sur iPhone et Android.

item.title: PrivadoVPN’s PhantomMode lands on iOS to stop apps spying on you — here's everything you need to know and how to set it up
item.description: PrivadoVPN has rolled out PhantomMode to iOS users, a feature that blocks hidden trackers and ads on your device. Previously an Android exclusive, it offers privacy protection that doesn't stop when you disconnect your VPN.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 leak suggests they could be missing a much-wanted AirPods 4 feature
item.description: A new Galaxy Buds 4 leak suggests Samsung is dropping a feature that could be incredibly valuable in its next earbuds lineup.
